name: StressScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Stress Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Stress as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: In the last month, how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you felt nervous and stressed [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you felt that things were going your way [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you been angered because of things that were outside of your control [PSS-10]
In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them [PSS-10]
How much stress have you been experiencing in the past week, including today # [SAMHSA]
Do you feel stress - tense, restless, nervous, or anxious, or unable to sleep at night because your mind is troubled all the time - these days [OSQ]
Have you been under or felt you were under any strain, stress, or pressure during the past month [NHANES]
Do you often feel under extreme stress Caregiver [SEEK]
